data.fullContent: The 1940 Summer Olympics were supposed to take place in Tokyo in September and October of that year. They were rescheduled to July and moved to Helsinki, because of Japan's involvement in a war. But the Helsinki games were eventually canceled too. World War II prevented any Olympic Games from happening in 1940 or 1944.
data.answer: 1940年的夏季奥运会原计划于当年的9月和10月在东京举行。由于日本卷入战争，他们被重新安排在7月，并搬到赫尔辛基。但是赫尔辛基奥运会最终也被取消了。第二次世界大战阻止了1940年或1944年举办奥运会。
